input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.span: Weekly breakfast and lunch meals are available for ALL children under the age of 18. Everyone is eligible; there is no need to complete an application, or qualify for free and reduced lunch!

Food items can be picked up every Monday from 4:00 pm to 6:00 pm using the circle drive behind the middle school. Please contact Jan Friedrich at 614-579-8807 or jan.friedrich@libertyunion.org for more information.

li.a: Ohio Department of Education's Parent Resources

div.h2:
Empowering all students to
maximize their talents.

div.span: The Liberty Union-Thurston School District has created this webpage to serve as a "one stop shop" for all information related to the COVID-19 situation. Please check back to this page regularly for the most up to date information in this rapidly changing situation.

text-node.text-node: No update on 4.21.2020 - Please check back tomorrow for an update on a Parent Feedback Survey.

a.span: Update: April 9, 2020 -- After today, the next update will be on April 15th due to Spring Break

text-node.text-node: No update on 3.27.2020 or 3.30.2020 - Please check back tomorrow for an update on Food Service and House Bill 197.

em.text-node: No update on 3.25.2020 - Please check back tomorrow for an update on Food Service for next week as well as parent resources for handling this COVID-19 situation and distance learning.

span.em: No update on 3.23.2020 - Please see March 20th upate for the most up to date information
